en:
"There are people walking around Dresden, who are afraid out of ignorance and afraid of what they don't know. If they would get to know this, it would look totally different.

I have to think about that guy, who said that it was like that with the Vietnamese after the end of GDR and now they are integrated. Saying that, he's denying the refugees now a chance. You just need to wait. Even if you don't get to know people, you can just give them some time before you judge them. It worked out with the Vietnamese. Why shouldn't work out with people from Syria, Iraq, or Afghanistan? They are all just people."
